attributes.action: Publish the governments report on the Muslim Brotherhood's activities  in the UK
attributes.additional_details:

attributes.background: The PM requested a report on the Muslim Brotherhood's activities in the UK. The report is complete but only parts will be published. Leaks indicate that  MB has close ties with Radical Islamic terrorism. we have  a right to know what's in this report in full. These radicals are hiding amongst us
